comments:
RC2

1. On the CVS-Edit preference page enable 'Watch/Edit' and configure to 'Always
prompt'
2. Select the plugin.xml and invoke 'Migrate to 3.0'.
3. press ok in the following dialog

Nothing happens, but a stacktrace is printed to the console (not the .log!)
 
java.io.FileNotFoundException:
C:\workspaces\runtime-workspace\MetricsPlugin\plugin.xml (Access is denied.
)
	at java.lang.Throwable.<init>(Throwable.java)
	at java.lang.Throwable.<init>(Throwable.java)
	at java.io.FileNotFoundException.<init>(FileNotFoundException.java:73)
	at java.io.FileOutputStream.open(Native Method)
	at java.io.FileOutputStream.<init>(FileOutputStream.java:196)
	at java.io.FileOutputStream.<init>(FileOutputStream.java:90)
	at java.io.FileWriter.<init>(FileWriter.java:66)
	at
org.eclipse.pde.internal.ui.wizards.tools.MigratePluginWizard.writeFile(MigratePluginWizard.java:125)
	at
org.eclipse.pde.internal.ui.wizards.tools.MigratePluginWizard.transform(MigratePluginWizard.java:109)
	at
org.eclipse.pde.internal.ui.wizards.tools.MigratePluginWizard.access$0(MigratePluginWizard.java:101)
	at
org.eclipse.pde.internal.ui.wizards.tools.MigratePluginWizard$1.run(MigratePluginWizard.java:55)
	at
org.eclipse.jface.operation.ModalContext$ModalContextThread.run(ModalContext.java:101)

Fixed by calling a single validateEdit() on all the files to be modified 
before the operation starts.  For each plugin, we validate the 
plugin.xml/fragment.xml, .project and .classpath.  If the user answers no, 
then we cancel the whole operation.  Otherwise, we proceed.
*** Bug 66626 has been marked as a duplicate of this bug. ***
